page.title: 04The Community Hut, Pitreavie
page.content: Pitreavie Community Hut. When the houses were built there was nowhere for meetings and activities so, due to social concern, it was decided there should be a community hut. The community hut was built in the school playground and that is where the activities take place. Here are some of the activities:- The Alana Brown School of Highland dancing,which takes place on Tuesday teatime. The 20th Dunfermline Guides takes place on Tuesday 7p.m.-9p.m. The Mothers and Toddlers Group on Mondays and Wednesdays)from newly born till 3 years old). Pitcorthie Pre-school Playgroup, Keep Fit; Youth Club on Sundays 7p.m.-9p.m. Sometimes discos and parties take place there. Kate Lynch.
